Sanchit Balchandani Engineering Manager @ EPAM India

About Me Skills Articles Talks

About Me

Result-oriented Software Developer with 15+ years of extensive experience in application development, including 2 years specializing in cutting-edge GenAI applications. Deep expertise in Python, Node.js, object-oriented programming, microservices architecture, and RESTful backend development using modern frameworks like FastAPI, Django, Flask, and Django REST Framework.

Working at EPAM India since 2019 as an Engineering Manager, currently leading the Python Discipline for EPAM India and successfully managing a dynamic team of more than 260 talented professionals. From a technology perspective, currently serving as a GenAI Architect, designing and delivering comprehensive end-to-end solutions across three distinct business streams, focusing on innovative AI-driven applications and intelligent automation systems.

Additionally, possess strong expertise in DevOps technologies including Docker for containerization, Kubernetes for orchestration, AWS cloud services for scalable infrastructure, Jenkins for continuous integration/deployment, and Terraform for infrastructure as code, enabling robust and efficient software delivery pipelines.

Active community leader and dedicated core member of the Hyderabad Python User Group since 2016, contributing to the growth of the Python ecosystem in India. Notable leadership roles include serving as Chair for PyCon India 2023 and PyCon Hyderabad 2022, and Co-organizer for PyCon India in 2021 and 2018, successfully organizing large-scale developer conferences that foster knowledge sharing and community building.
